H0.text: who do islamic people pray to. Muhammad

H1.text: who do islamic people pray to. Gabriel

H2.text: who do islamic people pray to. Abraham

H3.text: who do islamic people pray to. Allah

A4.text: The Qur'ān insists that Muhammad and his followers worship the same God as the Jews (29:46).

A5.text: In a Sufi practice known as dhikr Allāh (Arabic: ذِكر الله, lit. 'Remembrance of God'), the Sufi chants and contemplates the name Allah or other associated divine names to Him while regulating his or her breath.
